H0.text: Who was the executioner of Louis XVI. Charles Henri Sanson's brother, Henri Sanson

H1.text: Who was the executioner of Louis XVI. Georges Danton

H2.text: Who was the executioner of Louis XVI. Maximilien Robespierre

H3.text: Who was the executioner of Louis XVI. Sansom

A4.text: The execution by guillotine was performed by Charles-Henri Sanson, then High Executioner of the French First Republic and previously royal executioner under Louis.

A5.text: Henri Sanson was appointed Executioner of Paris from April 1793, and executed Marie Antoinette.

A6.text: Sanson performed 2,918 executions, including the execution of Louis XVI.

A7.text: Sanson was the executioner of Louis XVI.

A8.text: He had the duty to execute Louis XVI under the power of the sitting provisional government.
